description.narrative: - Multiplier effect: the IFC investment will support the closing of the hydrocarbon and electricity transport infrastructure gap in Colombia. This will result in substantial efficiencies through reductions in logistic costs and improvement of the economics of hydrocarbon fields, thus promoting further upstream investments. These investments will in turn result in increased regional economic activity, higher production and export revenues, and royalty revenues for the Government. - Positive environment and social outcome: The investment will also contribute to the reduction of greenhouse emissions by displacing oil trucking, while at the same time reducing the hazards associated to that activity.

Pacific Midstream Holding Corp (PM or the Company) is a new vehicle created by Pacific Rubiales Energy (PRE) to hold its interests in hydrocarbons and electricity transport infrastructure assets, and expand PRE´s oil & gas infrastructure business.
